summary: 💄 💕 & 🌸 please! I promise I'll get to answering mine soon! --🔪💚
question: 💄 💕 & 🌸 please! I promise I'll get to answering mine soon! --🔪💚
answer:
Hey there lovely, take your time it is fine, I’ll wait forever and a day for you!

💄 ~ what kind of kisses are the best kisses?

ALL THE KISSES!!! No seriously. All the kisses. I want affection. Need affection. All the time. I love kisses and smooches. If you are my friend and I am close to you prepare for me to gives you pecks everywhete I can reach: shoulders, neck, arms, hands, face. Sometimes without even noticing

As such I must say that my favourite kisses are soft ones against the scalp of the face/shoulders as you pass by or cuddle in bed or anything. Not necessarily romantic but filled with affection to show that you care and think about the other one (something I personally need a lot of reminders of so I like to give them to people)

🌸 ~ what’s the most memorable dream you had?

This is again a hard thing to say because I dream a lot and remember them quite often. One good dream I had I remember was that I was together with the main characters from Shadowhunters and I was friends witb them but we had a fight (mostly me and Alec) and we were driving in a bus and running around trying to save the world but also trying to find a way to get along again.

Also there was one with Phil Lester (Amazing Phil) and Daniel Howell (danisnotonfire) where Phil had a birthday and we were invited but he was a prince and I had the honour of sitting next to his dad at tbe banquet and was super scared but I made him laugh and everything was fine and then me and the guys drove home with the tube during sunset and laughed and told jokes. I literally woke up smiling.

A nightmare I sadly remember in very many details was that a guy was stalking me and he wanted me to open my door. He was super nice but I knew that he wanted to rape me and kidnap me so I didn’t and every time I looked through the doorhole thingy I saw that he had killed another person: my mom, her best friend that I have known since birth, my dog, my nice lesbian neighbour and her son… when the police finally came and arrested him I hqd to go outside and for that I had to step over their bodies and I felt so sick and then they passed with the guy and he ripped himself free, ran towards me and managed to grab a strand of my hair, smelling it, kissing and grinning at me before they caught him again.

So yeah… brain wtf.

🌸 ~ what fictional duo do you and your partner / best friend act like?

My first reaction to this was “Phil and Dan” before I remembered… oh yeah… welp. We are pretty much the same though. I talk weird stuff and she gives me “done” but love filled looks haha. And there is a lot more but you said fictional so I won’t analise them any further.

My next guess was that I am her Sherlock’s John. She is very, very intelligent and baffles people and also handsome and many talents and I am the good bean that loves and adores and supports her. But she is not at all emotionless, she actually has a lot of them and she understands people.

Maybe another duo like that. Can’t think of one right now. Maybe Hermione and Ron. Or Dipper and Mabble. Or Wirt and Greg. Though none if them is a perfect fit tbh

She is just too unique and grand to describe perfectly ^-^ Daniel Howell. She is Daniel Howell.

Hope this was fun to read! Can’t wait for the next one of these ✨✨✨✨

Hdj
